title: Strengthening Programming Practical Skills: VR-Based Science Education Design for Managerial Leaders (Short-Term)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts, experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can understand the basic operational principles of VR educational tools and apply them to science instructional design.
Learners can plan VR-based science education scenarios in corporate settings and execute a step-by-step development process.
Learners can design cost-effective VR educational material production strategies under budget constraints.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
